2124.subject: NURS
2124.descrlong: The student continues to add to an electronic portfolio that will include the application of Geriatric nursing concepts. This course will be taken concurrently with the student's Geriatric Community College nursing program course and seeks to promote, nurture, and grow the connection of concepts between the Community College nursing program and the CSUMB nursing program.

2134.subject: NURS
2134.course_title_long: Quality Safety Education for Nurses: Evidenced Based Practice
2134.descrlong: Seeks to nurture and grow the student's knowledge and attitudes toward the Quality Safety Education of Nurses (QSEN): Evidenced Based Practice. Promotes the development of student concept comprehension and application by sharing curriculum content between the Consortium Community College nursing programs and the CSUMB nursing program. Will be taken during dual enrollment with the student's first or in any subsequent semester in the Community College nursing program.
